Texts.Chs: 你是打算去吃那些洋芋吗？为什么不去尝尝你自己的皮肤呢？
Texts.Eng: Are you gonna eat that hashbrown? How about your own skin instead?

Did you really just....yea you did. That is ^red;hilarious^reset;, dude. I just called you across the cosmos to see if you died, and you are on a gas giant without protection. Amazing. Totally telling the guys ^green;right now^reset;. Die well!
God I love it when you're insane! You can never tell if its me talking or your own mind reaching a psychotic breaking point!.

Texts.Chs: 他妈的。你是我^orange;曾经^reset;见过的样貌最为古怪的东西了。你他妈到底是什么鬼？
Texts.Eng: Holy crap. You are one of the weirdest looking things I have ^orange;ever^reset; seen. What the heck are you?
I'm unsure if you are aware, but there appears to be a problem. You are still currently alive. Please correct the issue soon or you won't get more meat.
Thanks, minion. How about another ^green;completely pointless, annoying^reset; fetch task? Sound good? Tough crap. Do it anyway. Loser.

Texts.Chs: 喔喔，我可不是那个叫凯文的家伙，我只是你在精神错乱时听到的些许迷音罢了。另外，你应该朝自己开一枪。去做吧。，
Texts.Eng: Woooooooo, I'm totally not Kevin and just the voices of insanity telling you to shoot yourself in the appendix. Do it.
Yay. I shall feign enthusiasm in order to keep you working for me while dispatching you on ^green;yet another^reset; aggravating quest of complete annoyance.
